summary: I TOOK MY YEAR 2000 CHEVROLET BLAZER INTO GLEASON CHEVROLET IN FOREST PARK ILLINOIS TO SERVICE AN INOPERABLE HORN. I WAS TOLD THAT THE FRONT AIR BAG MODULE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED IN ORDER FOR THE HORN TO BE REPAIRED. (THE EXTENDED WARRANTY WILL NOT COVER THE COST OF REPAIRS.)   I NOW AM CONCERNED THAT I HAVE TWO SAFETY ISSUES.  1.) THE HORN DOES NOT WORK.  2.) APPARENTLY, THE AIR BAG MODULE IS DEFECTIVE.  GM WILL NOT COVER THE COST OF REPAIRS.*JB
